name: Micro Mash
description:
Multiplayer game where players must work together to move themselves, the organism, through a watery environment, while simultaneously battling each other to be the last arm standing. Each player is trying to outlast the other in order to be the one to influence evolution.

Credits
Programmer: Lee Tran @cltran86
Art/Producer: Brittney Oberfeld @boberfeld
Art: Kimberly Koronya @peachi
Music/Sound: Mike Romaniak @mikeromaniak
